column1: The Pit Room////I had the brisket and turkey and loved it! Turkey was the softest I've had for bbq. Brisket isn't the best I've had
column2: but the best I've had was Franklin's in Austin and Killen's in Pearland. It's connected to the bar next door
column5: and down some beers in the nice Houston weather. Note that I wrote this in November.
